Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Ullet Suites - Guest House in Liverpool, you'll be in the suburbs and close to Sefton Park Palm House and Liverpool ONE. This guesthouse is within close proximity of Sefton Park and Sudley House.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 11 guestrooms featuring refrigerators. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include irons/ironing boards, and both cribs/infant beds (complimentary) and rollaway/extra beds are available on request.

Business, Other Amenities
The front desk is staffed during limited hours. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

When you stay at Ullet Suites - Guest House in Liverpool, you'll be in the suburbs and close to Sefton Park Palm House and Liverpool ONE. This guesthouse is within close proximity of Sefton Park and Sudley House.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Sefton Park Palm House - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Sefton Park - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Sudley House - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Princes Road Synagogue - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Wavertree Botanic Gardens - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Otterspool Park - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Williamson Tunnels Heritage Centre - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Greek Orthodox Church of St Nicholas - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
University of Liverpool - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
CoverStar Experiences - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Philharmonic Hall - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Liverpool Metropolitan Cathedral - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Unity Theatre - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Everyman Theatre - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Liverpool City Church - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi

The preferred airport for Ullet Suites - Guest House is Liverpool (LPL-John Lennon) - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
